author: NewsBreak Original
title: The Best Pizza in the World Was Just Named—Here’s Where You Can Find It
text:
By Nathan Hutsenpiller ,
2 hours ago
Pizza will always be one of those foods that brings with it a ton of loaded opinions. It’s fairly easy to make, can be reimagined into dozens of different styles and has a cult following that will rival even the largest of fanbases. It’s not a bad thing that pizza is so popular; in fact, we prefer it to be that way. There are hundreds of pizza joints to choose from across the continental United States and we get the pleasure of trying them all anytime we are someplace new.
While taking a road trip across America to sample countless slices of pizza sounds like a childhood dream come true, it's not necessarily in the cards for most of us. Thankfully, the professional pizza rankers at 50 Top Pizza have done the dirty work for us, narrowing down the top performing pizzerias around the world. And surprise, surprise, NYC holds court in the number one position above the rest.
Related: Yelp Just Ranked the 100 Best Pizza Spots in the Midwest, and the Winner Might Surprise You
It takes a lot of hard work and dedication to be recognized as having the best slice in the world, and Anthony Mangieri’s Una Pizza Napoletana definitely deserves its flowers. Located in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, Mangieri’s shop sees itself finally landing in the top spot after spending 2023 and 2022 in second place.
Una Pizza Napoletana is the sixth iteration of Mangieri’s pizzeria, placing focus on creating the perfect pizza by starting with a naturally-leavened crust. The pizzeria employs an “ever-changing mix of Italian flours, unrefined Sicilian sea salt and NYC water,” to create the crust of the pie before tossing it into a wood-fired oven to gain its perfect level of crispness.
View the original article to see embedded media.
"In a country always accustomed to putting everything on pizza, Anthony proposes only the purest tradition in toppings, with extraordinary quality ingredients. Marinara, Margherita, Cosacca, and a pizza that changes every day, based on market ingredients,” noted the awards website , “The dough nods to the contemporary, but is so personal that it probably cannot be classified, good, tasty, true, it has the aroma and flavor of pizza."
Aside from their win as the top pizza shop worldwide (with Italy and Japan taking up the other places in the top five), Una Pizza Napoletana also took home the top spot in the ranking for the best pizzerias in the United States —a position they've held for the past three years.
This may not come as much of a surprise, but New York also found itself taking up two positions in the top five and seven positions in the top 20. Ribalta , located in the heart of Manhattan's Union Square neighborhood, came in fourth place, while Don Antonio and Song’ E Napule found themselves in seventh and twentieth positions, respectively.
San Francisco’s noteworthy second place position was taken up by Tony’s Pizza Napoletana , which divides its pizza menu up by style. The popular San Fran pizza joint offers Neapolitan pizza, New York-style, Detroit-style, Sicilian or really any other style of pizza you are craving.
Related: The Viral Recipe That Has Us Rushing to the Store to Buy Pizza Dough
View the original article to see embedded media.
Perhaps one of the most noteworthy finishes, however, comes from Philadelphia, in which Pizzeria Beddia snagged the third place position with no other sign of a Philly pizzeria showing up anywhere else on the list. Known to be the largest pizza spot in Pennsylvania, the Fishtown-born establishment boasts an indoor and outdoor dining situation and considers itself to be at the “top of the pizza quality movement” in the United States.
If your mouth is watering now just as much as ours is, you’ll want to take a gander at the full list here and start planning out your weekend immediately. Just be sure to save room for dessert though, because you know these pizza spots are going to have a tasty cannoli just waiting for your approval.
Up Next:
Related: Sam's Club Is Selling a Super-Handy Slow Cooker Trio for $40, and Shoppers Say It's 'Perfect for the Holidays'
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: Michelle Devani
title: Sweet Reasons Why Your Best Friend Is Your Soul Sister
text:
In life, you are going to be in awe about the relationship that you are being in. Sometimes you find a person that clearly belongs with you on some level and it is as if you have been with each other for a long time. Is it really true?
Soul sisters are a person that you feel like siblings with even if you are not a real sibling with them. You don’t come around these kind of person often so you need to keep them close. To keep them close you first need to realize the reasons why your best friend is your soul sister;
Contents
1. They Do Not Need An Explanation They do not need too much explanation on your feelings because they somehow already understand and that’s how you know that you are meant to cross path.
2. They Already Expect Your Needs Knowing your needs and providing it before you even think of it is what this mind reader best friend will do best.
3. You’ve Got The Same Kind Of Humor Humour and laughing uncontrollably comes naturally because you got the same kind of humor.
4. You Have Non Verbal Languages Both of you can look each other without talking and suddenly understand each other.
5. You Feel Comfortable With Them You are not afraid to be yourself with them and you feel so at home with them already.
6. Your Relationship Progresses So Fast Even if you both have only been friends for a short time, you already progress your friendship so fast.
7. You Are Not Shy Around Each Other Being timid is not an option when you are with each other because you already are not afraid to being yourself with each other.
8. Your Best Friend Is Non Judgemental To You They don’t judge your life and your action. They just accept you for who you are and doesn’t try to change you much because he doesn’t show the Signs of A Possessive Male Friend .
9. You Both Are Willing To Do Anything For Each Other It’s safe to say that you would both die for each other because you both feel this strong, lovely bond with each other.
10. You Both Feel Each Other’s Feelings Sympathy and empathy is high in your relationship with your soul sister best friend. Feelings that you feel personally will be felt by them too.
11. Your Family Likes Your Best Friend Your family already accept your best friend like she is a part of your family and it feels like she is the missing piece to your big, loving family.
12. People In Your Life Supports You Both The people in your life recognize that you are good for each other.
13. You Miss Your Best Friend Constantly You find yourself missing each other because you just enjoy each other’s presence so much.
14. They Are Willing To Protect You Protecting you is their number one priority because they feel like they are your sibling that should protect you.
15. You Feel Seen By Them It feels like you are more alive when you are with them. You feel accepted and unconditionally loved.
16. You Feel Appreciated By Them Non Verbally They show the Ways to Make Someone Feel Appreciated and Loved .
17, You Feel Loved By Them Non Verbally They constantly show the Signs A Man Loves You Secretly But He Won't Say .
18. Your Relationship Lasts For A Long Time Your relationship with your best friend is made to last for a really long time.
19. Fights Don’t Last Long Because you understand each other, fights don’t last long. Empathy and forgiveness will start to take place where the hatred was.
20. You Both Grow On The Same Pace Both of you have grown on the same pace.
21. You Are Both Supportive For Each Other Each of you are not trying to tear each other down because you respect each other. She is an angel and that's the reasons why your best friend is your soul sister.
Tips To Know That Your Best Friend Is Your Best Half Friendship is amazing and you will meet your better half in friendship. If you want to know if your current best friend is your other half, here are the tips to know that your best friend is your best half;
1. You Are Not Intimidated By Each Other You feel her as more of your sibling than your competition.
2. They Are Not Your Frenemy They don’t show the Signs That Your Best Friend Is A Frenemy
3. You Have Similar Experiences Throughout Your Lifetime This might seems weird but soul sister usually experience similar things throughout your lifetime.
4. Making You Feel The Happiest You feel so happy when you are with them.
5. They Never Leave You Your best friend will never try to leave you or abandon you.
6. They Make Efforts To Make You Happy Your happiness becomes their number one priority.
Ways To Make Your Best Friend Happy Your best friend already makes you so happy now what you need to do is to make your best friend happy with these ways to make your best friend happy;
1. Appreciate Them If you really want to make them happy, appreciate them and show that you are grateful for her.
2. Always Be Patient With Them Best friends will aggravate you but remember to be patient with them to have an enduring relationship.
3. Never Hurt Them On Purpose Put their happiness in the top of your priority and never make them miserable.
4. Never Abandon Them Abandoning them will leave a scar on her heart and she will never forgive you for hurtng her.
Seeing the reasons why your best friend is your soul sister in some people is amazing. It will make you have a happier and more content life. This is why you need to do ways to make your best friend happy. Then, you will start to have a long lasting, happy friendship that will color your day.

author: Emily Preston
title: ANALYSIS: Did OpenAI Scrape Its Way Into Copyright Infringement?
text:
In November, the Toronto Star newspaper and five other leading Canadian media companies and news outlets sued OpenAI in an Ontario court, arguing that the artificial intelligence company trained its ChatGPT models using data that was copyright protected under Canada’s Copyright Act.
Although the lawsuit is predicated on Canadian law, it joins a growing number of media company lawsuits targeting OpenAI over its practice of [scraping](https://www.bloomberglaw.com/product/blaw/document/X10SUETC000000?utm_source=ANT&utm_medium=ANP)—the process of using software to collect large swaths of public data from the internet.
It started with the New York Times, which [filed suit](https://www.bloomberglaw.com/public/document/TheNewYorkTimesCompanyvMICROSOFTCORPORATIONetalDocketNo123cv11195?doc_id=X1Q6OLFCFC82&utm_source=ANT&utm_medium=ANP) in the Southern District of New York in December ...

author: PeterPetrum
title: The BOM predicted a hot dry summer right before the flooding rains came…
text:
By Jo Nova
Australians are angry the BOM didn’t see the flooding rains coming
Worse, we’re betting the nation on the BOM’s ability to predict the climate.
The Bureau of Meteorology (BOM) tells Australians that record breaking extremes are getting worse because of our cars and our air-conditioners (that’s “
The State of the Climate“). But when the BOM can’t predict record breaking rain a month in advance, or even the day before, we know the BOM doesn’t understand what drives the climate.
Somehow the BOM expect Australians to spend trillions and rearrange their economy based on their fifty year prophesies, but not to mind when “this summer” goes right off the rails.
Back in September the BOM issued its El Nino alert, and Australians were told it would be a
 hot and dry and to prepare for a summer of bushfires. Farmer sold their lambs, and adjusted harvest accordingly.
This was the BOM solemn prediction in late October, for the very next month of rainfall
Across most of Australia the
odds were only 20-40% of getting average rain.
Instead this is what happened:
And in December most of the country was predicted to have a fifty fifty chance of getting “average” rain.
But the real weather gods had another idea, and all the places under any shades of green below got somewhere from 100% to 300% of the average rainfall. The indigo and purple zones got even more.
This was a savage downpour — seven feet of rain in five days fell at one location:
No fewer than 12 locations across far north Queensland posted record rainfall totals.
Some areas received a year’s rainfall in a single day, isolating towns, closing highways and leaving hundreds stranded by surging floodwaters. Black Mountain near Cooktown recorded a cumulative 2189mm over the five days, while Mossman South, an hour northwest of Cairns, had 1935mm.
As the Mayor of Douglas Shire said:
“If this is so record-breaking, how did no one know this was going to happen … we need to have forecasts closer to what is going on.”
The BOM suddenly wants to absolve itself of liability
People have noticed there is now a mandatory check box forcing users to agree to a legal disclaimer clearing the BOM of all liability:
Users of the BOM app now have to agree to a 699-word “terms and conditions” statement that includes “information at this app … may not be accurate, current or complete”.
“To the maximum extent permitted by law, the bureau excludes any liability that may arise in connection with the BOM Weather app or any information or material presented therein or your access to or use of any of the same,’’ the bureau says in a “terms and conditions” statement that appears when a user attempts to download its app. —
Mackenzie Scott, The Australian
They know they are in trouble.
I say the BOM can have immunity the same day Australians can also tick a box excluding ourselves from any and all costs, imposts and taxes related to any BOM predictions.
The Australian editors gives the BOM an escape valve it doesn’t deserve:
To be fair to the BOM, a hysterical and ill-informed media has allowed climate alarmism to infect reporting of what should be routine weather events.
For thirty years the Australian media has made hyperbolic scare stories about the weather while the BOM tacitly stood by and smiled. Where were they as the tenets of science were trashed, and critics were called “climate deniers”? If the BOM are victims of this hyperbole now, they reap what they sowed.
The BOM raised the stakes, and they don’t get to weasel out by saying
“we used the best science” as if the best science wasn’t riddled with holes. If the science is good enough to throw away trillions of dollars, then the worst failures need a truckload of explanation.
Predicting the weather is hard. We could forgive the BOM for getting a complex immature science wrong, but not when they also tell us it’s just simple physics, they’re absolutely sure, and there is no doubt they’re wrong (give us your money!).

author: 小浪财讯
title: 云计算ETF沪港深（517390）跌1.33%，成交额2666.36万元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
8月14日，天弘中证沪港深云计算产业ETF（517390）收盘跌1.33%，成交额2666.36万元。
云计算ETF沪港深（517390）成立于2021年12月10日，基金全称为天弘中证沪港深云计算产业交易型开放式指数证券投资基金，基金简称为天弘中证沪港深云计算产业ETF。该基金管理费率每年0.50%，托管费率每年0.10%。云计算ETF沪港深（517390）业绩比较基准为中证沪港深云计算产业指数。
规模方面，截止8月13日，云计算ETF沪港深（517390）最新份额为1.92亿份，最新规模为2.73亿元。回顾2024年12月31日，云计算ETF沪港深（517390）份额为4811.26万份，规模为4819.92万元。即该基金今年以来份额增加299.30%，规模增加465.55%。
流动性方面，截止8月14日，云计算ETF沪港深（517390）近20个交易日累计成交金额4.69亿元，日均成交金额2346.94万元；今年以来，150个交易日，累计成交金额27.40亿元，日均成交金额1826.58万元。
云计算ETF沪港深（517390）现任基金经理为祁世超、洪明华。祁世超自2025年2月14日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益14.39%；洪明华自2025年7月30日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益7.19%。
最新定期报告显示，云计算ETF沪港深（517390）重仓股包括腾讯控股、阿里巴巴-W、 中际旭创 、 新易盛 、 中科曙光 、 金山办公 、 浪潮信息 、 恒生电子 、金蝶国际、金蝶国际，持仓占比如下。 股票代码 股票名称 持仓占比 持仓股数（股） 持仓市值（元） 00700 腾讯控股 9.21% 6.00万 2752.27万 09988 阿里巴巴-W 8.87% 26.47万 2650.50万 300308 中际旭创 8.51% 17.44万 2544.09万 300502 新易盛 8.27% 19.46万 2472.16万 603019 中科曙光 6.77% 28.73万 2022.59万 688111 金山办公 4.26% 4.55万 1273.22万 000977 浪潮信息 3.44% 20.22万 1028.79万 600570 恒生电子 3.33% 29.69万 995.81万 00268 金蝶国际 3.28% 69.70万 981.41万 08133 金蝶国际 3.28% 69.70万 981.41万
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: redacaoterra
title: Atriz dá à luz filha com 'meio-irmão': 'Nosso milagre de Natal finalmente chegou'
text:
Atriz dá à luz filha com ‘meio-irmão’: ‘Nosso milagre de Natal finalmente chegou’
Pais de Scarlet Vas e Tayo Ricci são casados
Atriz na televisão australiana e criadora de conteúdo adulto, Scarlet Vas deu à luz a sua filha com Tayo Ricci, seu ‘meio-irmão’. Apesar de divulgarem poucos detalhes sobre o relacionamento, os pais dos influenciadores são casados.
Receba as principais notícias direto no WhatsApp!
[Inscreva-se no canal do Terra]
Casados desde 2023, em cerimônia realizada na Grécia, Vas e Ricci já mostravam detalhes da gestação aos seguidores. A revelação do nascimento, entretanto, aconteceu na última quarta-feira, 25, em pleno Natal.
“O nosso milagre de Natal finalmente chegou. Feliz Natal da nossa família para a sua”, escreveu o influenciador em publicação conjunta com a atriz. Nas fotos em destaque, eles aparecem segurando a criança na cama do hospital.
Vas e Ricci se conheceram ainda na adolescência e viralizaram ao contar suas histórias em 2021. Embora não contem detalhes da relação dos pais, os dois reforçam que não têm laços sanguíneos.
“Sinceramente, isso não nos afeta porque temos um ao outro. Eu realmente não os comentários, mas, se leio, eu realmente dou risada”, disse a mulher ao portal news.com.au.
Na televisão australiana, Vas teve destaque na série Neighbours. Ao longo de suas 41 temporadas, a produção já contou com nomes como Margot Robbie, Rebekah Elmaloglou e Kylie Minogue.

author: Casey DelBasso
title: 10 compact under-desk treadmills to increase your productivity in 2024 - Good Morning America
text:
If your 9-5 job is mostly sedentary, you may find it hard to get your steps in daily. Enter the compact under-desk treadmill or, as some call, it the \"walking pad.\"
With the new year just around the corner, it's a great time to start thinking about new routines and this small change can yield great results.
There are tons of options for under-the-desk at-home folding treadmills at a variety of price points, all of which are easily stored or can even be brought into your office.
While you answer emails, hop on a Zoom meeting or do any behind-screen tasks, you can also add in movement that will leave you feeling energized and closer to hitting your daily fitness goals.
A few features that we think are important to keep in mind when choosing a walking pad are foldable handles, wheels for easy transport or storage, and different speed settings. These settings allow flexibility based on whether you want to run, jog or walk. The adjustable handlebar feature will give you more comfort and control.
It's time to lace up your walking shoes and get moving -- scroll below to shop!
By clicking on these shopping links, visitors will leave Goodmorningamerica.com. These e-commerce sites are operated under different terms and privacy policies than Goodmorningamerica.com. ABC will receive a commission for purchases made through these links. Prices may change from the date of publication.
